name: @aws-lambda/mds-audit
description: AWS Lambda for MDS Audit API

scripts.lambda:develop-mds-audit: yarn bundle && aws lambda update-function-code --region us-east-2 --function-name develop-mds-audit --zip-file fileb://dist/bundles/mds-audit.zip
scripts.lambda:ladot-prod-mds-audit: yarn bundle && aws lambda update-function-code --region us-west-2 --function-name ladot-prod-mds-audit --zip-file fileb://dist/bundles/mds-audit.zip
scripts.lambda:ladot-sandbox-mds-audit: yarn bundle && aws lambda update-function-code --region us-west-2 --function-name ladot-sandbox-mds-audit --zip-file fileb://dist/bundles/mds-audit.zip

author: City of Los Angeles
